setting_autoTagTooltip.message: Check new emails for learned tags and apply tags.

setting_selectTagsTooltip.message: Choose the tags used for training and automatic tagging.

setting_thresholdTooltip.message: This value defines the probability at which a tag is applied. It is recommended to leave it at 99%.

setting_tagOnTrainingTooltip.message: If enabled, the relevant tag is applied or removed during training.

setting_removeOnClassifyLabel.message: Remove Tags When Classifying If Below Threshold

setting_removeOnClassifyTooltip.message: If enabled, tags are removed when the probability is below the threshold.

settings_loadTrainingDataError.message: Error loading training data. Please try again.

settings_invalidThreshold.message: Please enter a valid threshold between 1 and 99.

settings_saveError.message: Error saving settings. Please try again.

emailinfo_donation_message.message:
💖 Thank you for using PrioMailbox!
Maintaining this add-on requires a lot of time and effort.
Support PrioMailbox with a donation 💰
After donating and entering your code, this message will disappear.
👉 Settings & Donations

settings_donation_message.message: 💖 Thank you for using PrioMailbox! Maintaining this add-on requires a lot of time and effort. Support PrioMailbox with a donation 💰

settings_donation_request_code_descripti.message: If you have already donated, you can request your donation code via email here. Then enter your email address and donation code. As a thank you, no further donation reminders will appear in the program.

settings_donation_code_sent.message: A donation code has been sent to your email address.

settings_donation_invalid_code.message: The entered donation code is invalid.

settings_donation_invalid_email.message: Please enter a valid email address.

settings_donation_wait.message: Please wait 10 seconds before clicking again.

settings_donation_code_verified.message: Donation code successfully verified. Thank you for your support!
